response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and interests. Our product offers unparalleled value and benefits that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Considering its worth to you and its unique features, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1,300,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000, making it an attractive investment for you. We hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1300000}
